description: Properties of a material definition shall be presented as material definition properties. A material definition may define zero or more material definition properties. A material definition property may be tested to the evaluated property in a test specification where the measured results may be recorded in a property measurement attribute in a test result.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: contains
contents.description: The nested material definition property(s) makes up part of this material definition property as the whole.

contents.name: mapsTo
contents.description: If the parent material definition supports a material class, the material class property(s) is applied in the material definition property(s). This material definition property maps to the corresponding material class property.

contents.name: propertyType
contents.description: Defines the type of the property.

enumValues.name: classType
enumValues.description: The property value is defined for the class and there is no value associated with an instance

enumValues.name: instanceType
enumValues.description: the property value of the class is undefined

enumValues.name: defaultType
enumValues.description: The property value is defined for the class as the default instance value, but individual instances of the class may redefine specific values.
